summary: In order to cover up his philandering ways, a married Broadway producer sets one of his dancers up on a date with a chorus girl for whom he had bought a gift, but the two dancers fall in love for real.
cast: Fred Astaire|Rita Hayworth|Robert Benchley|John Hubbard|Osa Massen|Frieda Inescort|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams|Donald MacBride|Cliff Nazarro|Marjorie Gateson|Ann Shoemaker|Boyd Davis|Sam Ash|Bonnie Bronson|Lucius Brooks|Stanley Brown|Leon Buck|Harry Burns|John Cason|Eddie Coke|Tom Coleman|Buddy Collette|Monte Collins|Joe Comfort|Virginia Davis|Hal K. Dawson|Dona Dax|Lester Dorr|Frank Ferguson|The Four Tones|Harold Goodwin|Alfred Grant|Chico Hamilton|Ira Hardin|Robert Homans|Rudolph Hunter|Gwen Kenyon|Eddie Laughton|Red Mack|Beth Marlowe|Patti McCarty|Edward McWade|James Millican|Frank Mills|Peggy Lou Neary|Sunnie O'Dea|Jack O'Malley|Garry Owen|Paul Phillips|John Porter|Forrest Prince|Tom Quinn|Beth Renner|Jack Rice|Cyril Ring|Tim Ryan|Kay St. Germain Wells|Gwen Stith|Harry Strang|Frank Sully|Martha Tilton|Dorothy Vernon|Emmett Vogan|Dorothy Ward|Frank Wayne|Larry Williams
title: Desde aquel beso
